author: andyhot
msg: Also check the parameters, instead of just the headers for  dojo-ajax-request... makes simpler debugging

author: andyhot
msg: The skeleton tapestry javascript file that does nothing! But it does contain all (i hope) functions that tapestry-framework and tapestry-contrib use and is a good starting point for introducing several js frameworks. Application using this should not present any javascript errors - they'd just behave as if javascript was disabled.
